data.text:
Table of Biography

Alyson Michalka is an American actress, singer-songwriter, and guitarist. Alyson Michalka is best known for her portrayal of Keely Teslow in the Disney Channel series âPhil of the Future.â Aly was also nominated for a Young Artist Award for her performance in the film. For 22 seasons, she played Marti Perkins in the American cheerleading comedy-drama television series âHellcats.â

Early Life and Childhood

Alyson Michalka was born in Torrance, California, on March 25, 1989. Alyson Renae Michalka is her given name. As of the year 2024, her age is 34 years old. Similarly, she is a citizen of the United States and her zodiac sign is Aries. She is a devout Christian. She is of German ancestry. Aly Michalka, the eldest daughter of Mark Michalka (father) and Carrie Michalka, was born (mother). Moreover, her father owns a construction company, and her mother is a guitarist who has toured with the Christian rock band âJC Band.â Her parents later divorced.

Likewise, Amanda Joy (AJ) Michalka is an American actress, singer-songwriter, and rapper best known as one half of the musical duo âAly and AJ.â She has a sibling called Ricky as well. She and her brothers were raised in Seattle, Washington, and South California. For several years, both girls were homeschooled. They then attended Mack Elementary School. She has always been interested in singing and acting since she was a child.

Her mother, who is a self-taught guitarist, has both helped and inspired both of her daughters to pursue careers in the music industry. Aly began playing piano at the age of five, and then, at the age of thirteen, she began playing guitar. She has also performed in church plays since she was a child.

Alyson Michalka â Professional Life

Alyson Michalka made her professional acting debut in 2004 as Keely Teslow in the American science fiction comedy âPhil of the Future.â Her performance in the series was widely praised, and she was nominated for a Young Artist Award. She remained in the series until 2006. In 2005, she played Allyson Miller in the television film âNow You See It.â In 2009, she starred as Charlotte Barnes in the American musical romantic drama film âBandslam.â The film was about a group of friends who form a band and compete in a competition called âBandslam.â

She has appeared in many TV shows and series, including âCSI: NY,â âBreaking In,â âAnger Management,â âCupcake Wars Celebrity,â âMotive,â and âCelebrity Family Feud.â She and her sister appeared in many Disney Channel and MTV productions, including âSuper Sweet 16: The Movieâ and âAly & AJ: Sister Act.â From 2010 to 2011, Aly played Marti Perkins in the American cheerleading comedy-drama television series âHellcatsâ for 22 seasons. In 2007, she co-starred in the TV movie âCow Bellesâ with her sister, AJ. She has appeared in many films, including âThe Roommate,â âCrazy Kinds of Love,â âGrown Ups 2,â âSequoia,â and âThe Lears.â Her appearance as Rhiannon in the 2010 movie âEasy Aâ was also popular.

She co-starred with her niece, AJ, in the 2015 American Independent comedy-drama film âWeepah Way for Nowâ as Elle. Her husband, Stephen Ringer, wrote and directed the film. She portrayed Peyton Charles in the American supernatural thriller âiZombieâ from 2015 to 2019. From 2017 to 2019, Aly played the lead character Amy in the action-comedy web television series âRyan Hansen Solves Crimes on Television.â She is currently working on her new film âKilling Winston Jones.â In the film, she would play Cookie Jones.

Music Career

Alyson Michalka began her professional music career in 2004 when she and her sister, AJ, formed the musical duo âAly & AJ.â On August 16, 2005, Hollywood Records released the duoâs debut album âInto the Rush.â The album was a major hit, selling over a million copies worldwide. The album also won them a nomination for âContemporary Inspirational Artists of the Yearâ at the 2006 American Music Awards. The pair then followed up with their second record, âAcoustic Hearts of Winter,â which was also a critical hit. They released their third album, âInsomniatic,â on July 10, 2007, and it peaked at number 15 on the US Billboard 200.

Since charting at 17th on the US Billboard 100, their third albumâs track âPotential Breakup Songâ became their biggest single to date. Many promotional singles have been posted, including âJingle Bell Rock,â âNo One,â âOn the Ride,â âWalking on Sunshine,â and âNever Far Behind.â Up to this point, the couple has released ten music videos, six promotional songs, two extended plays, and one video album. The pair recently released an overt version of their best track âPotential Breakup Songâ on December 29, 2020. They previously released another song, âSlow Dancing,â on December 17, 2020.

Moving on, many sites claim that she is also doing endorsement activities for some brands. However, according to our research, she doesnât seem to be involved in endorsing or promoting brands or products. Nevertheless, she might be doing so in the future.

Alyson Michalka â Net Worth 2024

Alyson Michalkaâs professional work as an actor, singer-songwriter, and guitarist has earned her a decent living. Aly began her professional acting and singing career in 2004, and she has since risen to become one of the most well-known singers and actresses in the Hollywood film industry.

Her albums, films, series, and shows are undoubtedly her source of revenue. Aly has certainly amassed a sizable net worth, expected to be around $2 million as of 2020, as a result of her years of hard work. She also made money from sponsorship deals with well-known brands.

Personal Life

Alyson Michalka has a husband. She married Stephen Ringer, her only husband. Ringer is a producer and director from the United States. On the set of the film âSequoia,â the pair met for the first time.

They began dating and eventually got engaged in July 2014 in Big Sur, California. Later that year, on June 6, 2015, the pair married in a small ceremony in Portofino. The couple is now enjoying a happy life in Los Angeles, California.

Alyson Michalka â Body Measurements

Alyson Michalka is a stunning woman in her early 30s with a well-kept athletic body. She has a height of 5ft 8 inches (1.73m) and a body weight of about 55kg (121 pounds). Her body measurements are 36-24-36 inches, she wears a 34C top, and her shoe size is 8 (US). She has medium skin, blonde hair, and bright green eyes.

Social Media

Similarly, she is active on social media including Instagram and Twitter. She has gained more than 628k followers on Instagram under the username @iamaly. She has gained more than 608.7k followers on Twitter under the username @alyandaj.
